about_the_game:
US Cities X: Boston from Aerosoft includes more than 4,000 major buildings modelled, 350,000 realistically placed autogen buildings, nine helipads and five major airports including Logan International.

Enter Boston's buzzing airspace with a wide choice of aviation options. New England's largest city has plenty of helipads within its boundaries, some nice rural general aviation airports surrounding it and last but not least: Boston Logan. No other US airport of this size it that close to a major city center - thrilling and scenic approaches guaranteed! From there head out to Boston Harbor's islands or fly along the magnificent coastline dotted with some of the most attractive homes in New England.

Features


  • Detailed 3D renderings of the city center covered by more than 4,000 major buildings.
  • Aerial image coverage with up to 20cm/pix resolution.
  • 351,369 autogen objects placed realistically.
  • An incredible 1m /3ft resolution elevation model / mesh terrain
  • 9 Helipads:
    • 0MA1 - Massachusetts General Hospital Heliport
    • 7MA9 - Tufts Medical Center Heliport
    • 0MA4 - Boston City Hospital Heliport
    • MA39 - Brigham and Women's Hospital Heliport
    • 8MA9 - Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center Heliport
    • MA10 – Chambers Heliport
    • MA96 - Rent-A-Tool Heliport
    • 3MA7 - Lynn Gear Plant Heliport
    • 9MA9 - Thacher Island Helipad
  • Major airports in and around the city are covered with new high res ground images with customized mesh terrain:
    • KBOS - Boston Logan Intl
    • KBED - Bedford Hanscom
    • KBVY - Beverly
    • KOWD - Norwood
    • NZW - South Weymouth NAS (closed)
  • Sound effects like downtown- and highway traffic and animated gulls
  • Animated ships and boats in Boston Harbor
  • Traffic on most major roads (optional)
  • Includes a separate Scenery Density Tool, accessible from the Tools menu in your Steam library.
  • Includes full rendering of Thacher Island and its helipad!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP Service Pack 2 or later.
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or higher (single core).
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9 compliant video card or greater, 256 MB video RAM or higher, Shader Model 1.1 or higher (Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required).
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible.
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection required for multiplayer features.
